summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1380, for the improvement of Lander Street, from Fourteenth Avenue South to Twenty-first Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 15110 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
